name: [red]BTD[#0000FF]Dustry + Terra dustry[]
author: [red]D[green]u[yellow]n[blue]c[]
description: Adds a LOT of stuff related to the Bloons Tower Defence series and the grand-slam-hit 'Minecraft clone' Terraria. the Bloons TD series is a series by Ninja Kiwi and Terraria is a game by Re-Logic. No copyright Infringement intended.
